title: 103: Post Nut Clarity at the Club
itunes:title: Post Nut Clarity at the Club
description:
Twall and Mblau are up to their usual shenanigans. They talk about jerking off at the club, how doc martens make them hard, and how horny people will fight you. They also discuss whether or not it's weird to sleep with a stuffed animal when you are 28 years old. This is a podcast about semen and science.
